alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; East Laramie County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 1:29AM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Gusty outflow winds from decaying thunderstorms will impact portions of Kimball and southeastern Laramie Counties through 215 AM MDT... At 128 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking decaying thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hillsdale to near Pine Bluffs to 12 miles northwest of Westplains. Movement was north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kimball, Pine Bluffs, Burns, Oliver Campground, Hillsdale, Oliver Reservoir, Kimball Airport, Panorama Point, Carpenter and Bushnell. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 373 and 402. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 1 and 25. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; East Laramie County
